name: Tarantula GT-870 Mark 1 Cannon
name_cn: 狼蛛GT-870 Mark 1 实弹加农炮
description:
Manufacturer: Gallenson Tactical Systems
Item Type: Ballistic Cannon
Size: 1
Fed by Gallenson Tactical’s patented SpinGlide drum ammunition system, the Tarantula GT-870 Mk1 can smoothly and accurately deliver a consistent stream of ballistic shells. Though it only has a moderate rate of fire, its trustworthy durability makes it a dependable addition to any fight.
description_cn:
制造商：加仑森战术系统(Gallenson Tactical Systems)
物品类别：实弹加农炮
尺寸：1
使用加仑森战术专利的旋转滑行弹鼓供弹系统供弹，狼蛛 GT-870 MARK 1能够顺滑而精准地发射连续不断的实弹炮弹。尽管它只有中等水平的射速，但值得信赖的耐用性使它成为任何战斗的可靠补充。
